name: Top 50 Spotify Songs - 2019
data_intro: The top 50 most listened songs in the world by spotify. This dataset has several variables about the songs.

cat_feature_intro.Track.Name: The title of the song.
cat_feature_intro.Artist.Name: The name of the artist who performed the song.
cat_feature_intro.Genre: The genre of the song, such as Pop, Hip-Hop, EDM, or Latin.

num_feature_intro.Unnamed: 0: Index column, likely an artifact of dataset formatting.
num_feature_intro.Beats.Per.Minute: The tempo of the song, measured in beats per minute (BPM).
num_feature_intro.Energy: A measure of intensity and activity in the song, with higher values indicating more energetic tracks.
num_feature_intro.Danceability: A measure of how suitable the song is for dancing, based on tempo, rhythm stability, and beat strength.
The overall loudness of the song, measured in decibels (dB).
num_feature_intro.Liveness: A measure of the presence of a live audience in the recording, where higher values suggest a greater likelihood of a live performance.
A measure of the musical positiveness of the song, where higher values indicate happier and more upbeat tracks.
The duration of the song in seconds.
A measure of how acoustic the song is, with higher values indicating a greater presence of acoustic elements.
A measure of spoken word presence in the song, with higher values indicating more speech-like qualities.
num_feature_intro.Popularity: A numerical score representing the song's popularity on Spotify.
